page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: THIS AREA IS PART OF THE NW OF THE CITY OF GLASGOW. THE AREA IS MADE UP MOSTLY OF HOUSES WITH A SMALL BIT OF INDUSTRY IN THE SW. THE HOUSING TYPES SHOW GREAT VARIETY. IN THE SE (TEMPLE) AREA HOUSES ARE MOSTLY OF THE OLD TENEMENT TYPE DATING FROM AROUND 1900. THIS AREA IS UNDERGOING RENOVATION. IN THE NE HOUSING IS MOSTLY HIGH QUALITY PRIVATE DETACHED AND SEMI-DETACHED VILLAS AND BUNGALOWS. IN THE SW (KNIGHTSWOOD) ARE COUNCIL SEMIS,COTTAGE FLATS,LOW RISE FLATS AND MAISONETTES BUILT AROUND 1930. IN THE NW IS AN AREA OF COUNCIL TENEMENTS AND HIGH-RISE FLATS KNOWN AS DRUMCHAPEL,PARTS OF WHICH ARE AMONGST THE MOST{DEPRIVED IN BRITAIN.
